charges.charge_description: MARIJUANA-POSSESSION-did knowingly possess an illegal controlled substance of an unmeasured amount of marijuana (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant is hereby placed on supervised probation for 1 year with standard and special conditions, including participation and completion of substance abuse program as directed by the Probation Office, to include antabuse treatment and urine surveillance if indicated. Defendant will pay associated expenses as may be directed by the Probation Office.Defendant is to pay a special assessment of $25.00 and total fine of $1,000.00 within 90 days
